body: Lmao his tiny short pencil dick ain't even hitting her cervix

I feel like the story has a deeper meaning but I can't quite see it. Dude suddenly woke up in his younger body. He then met this girl who drugged and raped him. In the end of their long ass sex, Dude was like "I can't anymore. At this rate, I might die." Girl was like "Yeah, then go die". Dude then wakes up back to his original body and back to where he was before losing consciousness. He thought he was just dreaming it all but finds the girl's ID. He swears that the next time he meets her, he won't show her mercy. END. Im assuming the girl was the one who turned his body into a kid for her own fetish, but really there's not much that directly say that. Still, I think that's the only plausible theory from this.

@zombieadd i think the guy turned into a child and the girl maybe caused it by drugging him? i’m guessing by the injection on page 19. and then she met him and drugged his drink and had the sex and stuff. then the guy wakes up and returns to normal and he has the girl’s id sort of implying that they’ll meet again by choice.
but i could be overanalysing things lmao
